messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Unschooling conference in SC - Question
messages.msgSnippet: ... I ll be there, and I m bringing my son, he s 6.  My husband won t make it. But I bet I m coming the most distance!  Unless one of our down-under
messages.messageBody:
4/26/03 17:21:

> We're planning to bring the kids with us - they are 11, 9, and 6. I'd like
> them to meet other unschooling kids and have some fun! The storytelling
> picnic sounds great as do the descriptions of the funshops from last year.
> We're planning on turning it into a little family vacation - since we have a
> 14 hour drive to get there.
>
> Pam L.

I'll be there, and I'm bringing my son, he's 6. My husband won't make it.
But I bet I'm coming the most distance! Unless one of our down-under
unschoolers shows up!

brenda
Friedberg, Germany
